mapper.select: SELECT TreatmentFormatID, Type, name FROM treatmentformat
SELECT reportFormatID, clinicItem, CancerType, Pathological FROM clinicreportformat
SELECT TreatmentID, Username, TreatmentName, Description, Dosage, beginDate, endDate, IsPosted FROM treatment WHERE username = #{username} ORDER BY endDate DESC

SELECT StatusID, Username, StatusDesc, InsertedDate, IsPosted, scanData, imageURL FROM patientstatus WHERE username = #{username} and (((StatusDesc is not null) and (StatusDesc != "")) or ((scanData is not null) and scanData != "")) ORDER BY InsertedDate DESC
SELECT TreatmentID, Username, TreatmentName, Description, Dosage, beginDate, endDate, IsPosted FROM treatment WHERE username = #{username} AND IsPosted = 1 ORDER BY endDate DESC
SELECT StatusID, Username, ClinicReport, StatusDesc, InsertedDate, IsPosted, scanData FROM patientstatus WHERE username = #{username} AND IsPosted = 1 ORDER BY InsertedDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patientstatus(Username, statusDesc, InsertedDate, IsPosted, scanData, hasImage) VALUES( #{username}, #{statusDesc}, #{insertedDate}, #{isPosted}, #{scanData}, #{hasImage} )

INSERT INTO clinicdata(clinicItemName, clinicItemValue, statusID, insertUsername, insertDate) values
(#{ClinicData.clinicItemName}, #{ClinicData.clinicItemValue}, #{ClinicData.statusID}, #{ClinicData.insertUsername}, #{ClinicData.insertDate})
mapper.select: SELECT clinicDataID, statusID, clinicItemName, clinicItemValue, insertUsername, insertDate FROM clinicdata WHERE insertUsername=#{insertUsername} ORDER BY insertDate Desc

SELECT user.username, age, stage, cancerType, pathological, metastasis, geneticMutation, treatmentName, dosage, beginDate, endDate FROM user, treatment WHERE treatment.Username = user.username and isPosted = 1 and (beginDate >= #{beginIndexDate}) AND (beginDate <= #{endIndexDate}) order by beginDate Desc
SELECT StatusID, Username, StatusDesc, InsertedDate, IsPosted, scanData, imageURL FROM patientstatus WHERE StatusID = #{statusId} ORDER BY InsertedDate DESC
